incorrect_categorization.issue: Virtualization/disaster recovery question categorized as 'Mobile Devices' - should be 'Cloud Computing'
PaaS cloud service question categorized as 'Mobile Devices' - should be 'Cloud Computing'

incorrect_port_answers.issue: Port 427 is Service Location Protocol (SLP), not SMB/CIFS
Port 548 is AFP (Apple Filing Protocol), not HTTP
Port 3389 is RDP (Remote Desktop), not HTTP

networking_questions_misplaced.issue: Network port identification questions categorized as 'Mobile Devices' - should be 'Networking'

outdated_mobile_concepts.issue: Answer states sandboxing is 'to enable multiple operating systems' - incorrect. Should be 'to prevent malicious programs from infecting the device'
outdated_mobile_concepts.current_answer: to enable the phone to run multiple operating systems
outdated_mobile_concepts.correct_answer: to prevent malicious programs from infecting the device

missing_topics: Modern mobile security (app permissions, device encryption)
Mobile app distribution models (sideloading vs app stores)
Modern mobile hardware (OLED displays, wireless charging, biometric sensors)
DevOps and CI/CD in cloud environments

recommendations.action: Fix all incorrect network port answers - these are fundamental networking concepts
Recategorize networking questions to 'Networking' topic instead of 'Mobile Devices'
Move cloud computing questions to correct topic category
Fix mobile device sandboxing answer - currently incorrect
Add modern mobile device questions covering iOS 16+, Android 13+, 5G, and modern security features
Expand cloud computing coverage with modern concepts like serverless, containers, and multi-cloud strategies
Add Mobile Device Management (MDM) and enterprise mobility questions

validation_notes: Only 2 questions are properly categorized as Cloud Computing, rest are either Mobile Devices or incorrectly categorized networking questions
Mobile Devices questions focus heavily on basic troubleshooting and synchronization, lacking modern mobile technology coverage
17 questions about network ports are miscategorized as Mobile Devices questions
Missing coverage of current mobile OS features, 5G capabilities, and modern cloud services
Several fundamental networking protocol answers are incorrect

mobile_devices: Modern biometric authentication (Face ID improvements, under-display fingerprint)
cloud_computing: Edge computing and content delivery networks
Cloud cost optimization and FinOps practices
